dcterms:description: The ACDC dataset consists of 200 cardiac cine MRI scans from 100 patients, including three segmentation classes: left ventricle (LV), myocardium (Myo), and right ventricle (RV).
dcterms:title: ACDC

dcterms:description: The LA dataset consists of 100 gadolinium-enhanced MRI scans, used for segmenting the left atrium from late gadolinium-enhanced cardiac magnetic resonance imaging.
dcterms:title: LA
